metadata.title: CVE-2018-5802 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An error within the "kodak_radc_load_raw()" function(internal/dcraw_common.cpp) related to the "buf" variable in LibRawversions prior to 0.18.7 can be exploited to cause an out-of-bounds readmemory access and subsequently cause a crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-1
libraw16 - 0.18.8-1
No subscription required
